Negative_Review: Can t remember something i didn t like over there
Positive_Review: Location Staff Facilities Free Wi Fi All great things at hyatt regency london the Churchill

Negative_Review: The resturant my wife ordered a burger cooked medium but it came well past well done Not burned but way too tough to eat The first night there we both ordered burgers and it was one of the best we d ever had
Positive_Review: The Regency Club membership was given as a gift for our anniversary as well as them bringing us Champane and cake for two They just surprised us Went out of there way to make us feel special on our special day

Negative_Review: Flies in the buffet area They never replace the water in room and have to call them everyday to get water
Positive_Review: Location was very central Nice bathroom and room Comfy bed Good entertainment on TV

Negative_Review: BESIDES COFFEE TEA OFFERED IN THE ROOM HOT CHOCOLATE SHOULD ALSO BE OFFERED PERHAPS PAPER PLATES PLASTIC CUTLERY SHOULD ALSO BE IN ALL THE ROOMS
Positive_Review: THE ROOM WAS ALWAYS VERY CLEAN WITH TOWEL CHANGES EVERY DAY TOILETRIES EXCELLENT BED BEDDING EXCELLENT

Negative_Review: There are some twin rooms seperated with a wooden door for large families If you stay in one of those rooms sometimes it might be noisy if the people staying next door speak loudly or listen to music I had such an experience but when I told this at the reception they apologized and made some discount on my bill
Positive_Review: Location was perfect Just 100 m to all shopping centers famous Oxford street and public transport Breakfast was good Staff was polite and helpful

Negative_Review: Room modern but a bit austere No cupboards Not a lot of light in the room Next time will try for better room
Positive_Review: Superb staff great location Fantastic breakfast

The bed was great room was well appointed the front desk staff Lorenzo was very resourceful and helpful Hotel staff welcoming and accomodative The bathroom in the hotel room with heated seat is the best

Negative_Review: Our toilet did not have the washing system as the other rooms we stayed in park view suite and connected to twins room and both rooms had no washing system which was disappointing
Positive_Review: Location room size staff and this is our favorite hotel in London and we stay in it in every trip

Negative_Review: the room was very small compared to other London hotels i stayed in the view wasn t better room window was towards a side street and nearby building you need to pay extra to get a better room view portman square in front of the hotel is private and closed the room card keys needed to be programmed couple of times
Positive_Review: room was very clean and updated staff was very nice and friendly specially Mr Yam the porter house keeping was fast to change the feather pillows and bed lining in my room since i have an allergy to feathers the bed was nice and comfortable WiFi was excellent and very fast

Negative_Review: Booking com we re supposed to cover some of the cost of the booking due to issues we had with a previous apartment I have instead been billed the full amount by the hotel I have yet to call up the Hyatt and discuss as well as booking com The weekend was going well until this happened which has left a sour taste in my mouth and i will think again before using booking com
Positive_Review: Beds were comfy and the decor was classy and tasteful All in all a nice hotel

Negative_Review: We were staying on the 2nd Floor near a Ballroom and you could hear the music from the event there the whole night
Positive_Review: Breakfast super friendly staff and good location

Negative_Review: There was a delay in getting the luggage to the room possibly because the arrival time was a couple of hours before check in time
Positive_Review: Excellent location modern furniture and furnishings the room size was perfect great variety for breakfast being a vegetarian was not an issue

Negative_Review: We needed to ask for some amenities like bottles of water and tooth brush It wasn t refill on the next day after clean up
Positive_Review: the bed is very comfy We re a group of 4 ladies and we all slept very well during our stay

Negative_Review: I didnot get the room which i book from point of facility and comfort as they inform that they have avalible connected rooms but they cannot give me until i pay extra money which i found it very bad attitude from the staff
Positive_Review: Only location

Negative_Review: the shower water comes out to the whole bathroom
Positive_Review: the WiFi is good and I loved the two times house keeping room service a day and 2 bottles free water a day

Negative_Review: It is VERY expensive especially on the South African Rand ZAR But it was for one night only and if I can afford it in future I would not want to stay anywhere else in London ever again
Positive_Review: The most amazingly helpful and friendly staff from reception through to every other department that we had contact with e g housekeeping Also this is possibly the best hotel bed I have EVER slept in Is there a bed size bigger than King Size Extra Length This certainly looked and felt bigger than my own King Size at home LOVED our stay here

Negative_Review: We paid for a room for 3 people but one of the beds was a bunk maybe this should have been a normal single bed If it was a child that would be different but it was 3 adults But in saying that was still so comfortable the hotel staff were so fantastic
Positive_Review: The service was outstanding Room beautiful Cleaned daily Location couldn t have been better Will for sure go back Wouldn t go anywhere else now Loved so much

Negative_Review: Wish I could afford to stay here all the time
Positive_Review: Easy walk to the shops on Oxford Street restaurants nearby Gracious and friendly staff Request for early check in easily accommodated

Negative_Review: Reception staff were rude during check in hotel is very old smelly and its time for extreme makeover rooms were small and there was no coffee machine which is usually provided by any 5 stars hotel During my stay I called the housekeeping on a daily basis to provide water shampoo towels etc Moreover by the checkout time I paid the total amount in cash and the hotel is still blocking my bank account Overall it wasn t a 5 stars hotel and overrated
Positive_Review: location only

Negative_Review: This is more that I am used to paying BUT it was extremely comfortable and a very pleasant atmosphere No problem getting a taxi and staff do not stand around waiting for tips
Positive_Review: Excellent reception and indeed all staff are there for your comfort and convenience Excellent decor and feel good factor Rooms comfortable and well insulated so we got a good nights sleep Wonderful location

Negative_Review: My sons put up bed was not really adequate for a 5 11 14yr old Unfortunately he turned over in bed and sustained quite a nasty cut to his right eyebrow on the corner of the bedside table that he had no choice but to be very close to
Positive_Review: Everything

Negative_Review: The windows don t open fully
Positive_Review: The concierge were extremely helpful the staff in general were very cooperative Spacious rooms compared to other hotel in London The electronic washing toilet Cleaned the room twice a day Complimentary water bottles daily and treats Location Fully equipped facilities for disabled guests

Negative_Review: Food and Beverage very expensive Solution was to eat at any number of the excellent restaurants and pubs around the corner
Positive_Review: We really liked the following about the property 1 The location is terrific with great shops restaurants and transport nearby 2 The room was a good size 3 The bed was sensational Very comfy 4 Very friendly staff who were helpful always

Negative_Review: 1 The king bed was two single mattresses put together very poor 2 The shower floor was sticky 3 The sofa in the room was not very comfortable to sit on This was in a king suite
Positive_Review: 1 The location was very good 2 Staff was friendly
All the staff in the hotel were very wonderful and very helpful The hotel very wonderfully location Luxury design I recommend everyone travels to London to stay at this hotel

Negative_Review: Breakfast we had to use the corridor as it was busy There were draughts and service had language problems
Positive_Review: The food was excellent in all respects

We loved the location and the fact it s so quiet and peaceful away from the hassle and bustle of central London Room was lovely with very comfortable king size bed Great cappuccino in the main lounge Just loved the atmosphere of this hotel which we will definitely recommend to anyone visiting London

Negative_Review: The attitude of staff The treatment that discriminate The awkward talk that levelled to highly discriminative manner
Positive_Review: the location Is excellent the hotel is a good one the breakfast and its lounge are average not good or to the standard of money paid for the hotel

Negative_Review: The restaurant and dinning arrangements are inadequate for the size of the hotel and certainly do not reflect its 5star rating
Positive_Review: The location is excellent for discovering the west end The hotel room was a good size and well appointed

Negative_Review: My room was cold no matter how i adjusted the temp Toilet is cold with no heated bars for towels etc
Positive_Review: Good breakfast selections Great location as well

Negative_Review: The room was cleaned daily but if a napkin was under pillow then it stayed under pillow Dust was still on tables During breakfast the smell of forks stink
Positive_Review: The location The staff were helpful

Negative_Review: Inside the room they don t change the linens and bed sheet for ten days because we don t have the paper that said change the sheet Last fivve days we the house keeping put this paper and they change it In addition I don t like the way of chick in with the trainer they put the mistake to each other My booking is 5 850 My card have more than this amount he don t know how to take the amount he tell me go bring it cash Imagin 5000 all in 20 segments after i give them cash and complete the rest of the amount the orderd 650 pounds as an deposit While i am withdrew I lose 250 commissions for the bank Totally unprofessional
Positive_Review: Location security and breakfast

Negative_Review: Bad elevators speed as it takes too long only 3 elevators are there one elevator was having problems several times of my stay there the space hallway when we go out of the elevators and heading to our room sometimes smells like kitchen Gym doesn t contain good equipment like hotel next door as it only contains Dumbbells one bench and cardio machines running cycle elliptical
Positive_Review: Professional Staff Very friendly Clean rooms bathrooms Amazing house keeping comfort beds and rooms amazing room design room size was fine

Negative_Review: I should check in at 2 they gave me the room at 3 I came from a long trip i was so tired and the late check in annoyed me
Positive_Review: The service is fantastic
Very good location near to everything that you might need and the staff are proud to serve the clients Everything s were very good my first choice for the next trip

Negative_Review: We were initially placed in a room within an area currently being renovated and the drilling was pretty intrusive No walk in shower at 21 weeks pregnant posed an additional problem and the cleanliness of the first room was not good Had this been the extent of our experience I would have been deeply disappointed
Positive_Review: My husband immediately sought assistance and the front desk staff were quick to remedy our unfortunate room placing us on a higher floor away from disturbance The room was sensational spotlessly clean an entirely different feel to it and thank heavens a walk in shower The room change transformed our opinion of the hotel and we were impressed with the nimble and proactive approach from the front of house A lovely night in a super location ensued

Negative_Review: Housekeepers don t remove all used items such as tissue towels paper bags and water bottles Bathrooms and cups are not thoroughly cleaned daily
Positive_Review: The community of staff is very lovely and helpful at all times The location and atmosphere is also wonderful

Negative_Review: We didn t eat breakfast as we considered it too expensive for that particular meal
Positive_Review: We liked the position of the dining bar area as one could sit relax and watch the world go by

Negative_Review: No internet Are you kidding I should have had a refund for my enormous roaming charges to try and get any work done Next time warn your guests if you don t have it Very bad impression
Positive_Review: No Positive
Newly refurbished comfortable and pleasant bedroom and bathroom excellent room service all staff friendly polite and efficient Quiet but central location

Negative_Review: Didnt like 2 things The houes keeper didnt change the bed sheets and when i talked to her she told me we chang it every 2 days But her manger come and apologise and said it should be every day which was wired from big hotel Second thing when i did check out the hotel hold a new amount on my visa card for the whole staying which put me in trouble N when i emaild the hotel they said by mistake Which is not acceptable at all the hold anew amount for the whole days i stayed n it takes 3 days till its relased
Positive_Review: Stuff was lovely n friendly and they dont like to see you waiting for help Perfect location 5 min from oxford st The restrunt down is perfect n the stuff is so kind I recommened staying in this hotel

Negative_Review: Minimum spend required if sitting in the outside area at your bar even though we were hotel guests
Positive_Review: Very comfy bed and we were upgraded as it was our wedding anniversary Staff left a lovely cake and bottle of bubbles in our room which was a lovely surprise

Negative_Review: I found a cockroach at the bathroom I stays for 9 nights at the hotel and when I asked for 2 hours late check out thay refused
Positive_Review: The location was excellent

Negative_Review: My baby had a cold while we were in London so I wasn t sleeping all night I called Housekeepers at 1 am to bring extra complementary water so they did but the next night one of the staff his name was Ron refused to bring me 1 bottled water and if I want more he will charge it to the room very rude and he hanged up the phone very quickly This thing has never happened to me at any hotel around the world they always and every day will offer more than 4 complementary water for two ppl this thing really bothered me and I don t want to come back
Positive_Review: after I booked the hotel I read some really bad reviews so I wanted to cancel my booking but since It s not free I hoped it will be fine and it was Staff were friendly and very nice except Ron the elevators were fast and no waiting maybe because it s October the room is clean food was delicious WC has washer
A beautiful luxurious hotel Staff friendly and efficient Spacious room by London standards Location couldn t be better yet room was quiet My second time to stay here but not my last I expect

Negative_Review: I didn t get the room I booked till end of the day Always request to see the room before checking in as the reciptibist will always tell I checked you in a lovely room The first room they tried to stick me in had a no door no walls cabinet it was badly designed I couldn t open the drawers they hit the bed table
Positive_Review: Location Japanese toilet system lobby

Negative_Review: Twin room is too small room deco doesn t feel like 5 star hotel also the corridor room carpet smell bad it s probably because it s old and lack of cleaning
Positive_Review: Location and shower are great Staffs are very friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: The hotel was busy we couldn t have late check out
Positive_Review: Very comfortable beds the staff were helpful and nice Location is excellent 10 minutes to Hyde park and 5 minutes to oxford st supermarket Waitrose The size of the room was good not too small ATM machine n the lobby

Negative_Review: WIFI was not working most of the time 7 days saying they are working to fix it ASAP Just on the fifth day I was told that there is a possibility to set up hot spot in my room to overcome the general wifi problem The bathroom drainage was poor and the bathroom was flooded Maintenance came 3 times to fix it but it didn t help
Positive_Review: Beautiful renovated room with nice view

Negative_Review: busy hotel all day staff dont even notice you and most of time not welcoming you worst customer service I had in my life felt like 2 stars hotel because I always stay at luxury 5 stars hotels and get treated well this time didnt happen 1st I told them its my 1st time at your hotel and they were like Oh really yeah sure its Hyatt Regency Churchill the best and blah blah blah no one showed me how to use card for elevators and nobody bothered to show me the way to my room or presenting the room and the facilities they have Like Go find the room yourself and I requested late check out and didnt get it because its OVER booked I never heard that before and when I was waiting fof my taxi I noticed alot of guests leaving from their Rooms late after 5 pm so they just wanted me out of the room and my luggages were left OUTSIDE the hotel 12 pm and Im leaving after 6 pm when I asked them why they said we are busy and didnt get chance to store them I understand the being busy part but why throwing them outside like Im not welcome here And what was the worst of all when I asked 2 times to talk to the manager he she didnt want to meet me which was really rude I paid 1440 for 4 nights to get the best customer service but I was so disappointed Next time Im London sure I dont want to be back to this 2 stars staff hotel and will never recommend it to any of my friends or family
Positive_Review: rooms were new and decent size and could find all amenities you need bathroom was small and wished it had walk in shower not a tub tea and coffee with kettle comfort beds and not bad view of portman square

Negative_Review: We went to the bar in the evening The staff told us we had to spend 25 per person to go to the terrace and also would not let us sit in the large booths that we wanted to That was after we spent 800 in the restaurant
Positive_Review: The champagne brunch was amazing We stayed over too and the facilities in the room were exceptional

Negative_Review: sometimes a bit hectic and felt a bit uncoordinated eg check in There were 5 concierge statt standing around and 2 charming ladies behind the reception which had all hand fulls because of many guests trying to check in or out another example Breakfast very hectical atmosphere Also would be great to have a larger cigar terrasse or why not a lounge to compliment CHURCHILL since tables are a rare
